title: Super Bowl - monetary compensation for players playing in the game 2011 to 2020
summary: Overall Winning team, and Loosing team are gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Winning team, and lastly, 2. Loosing team.
Loosing team reported the lowest Pay in thousand U.S. dollars about 44.0 in Year 2012
The greatest difference of Pay in thousand U.S. dollars between Winning team and Loosing team occurs at Year 2016 and the smallest difference occurs at 2012.
